name: Mail Mash
description:
The unthinkable has happened in  the Generic Co Teleporter Shipping facility, someone dropped some coffee on the teleporter controls and set every package that was supposed to be delivered all over the facility!

We need to fix this and fast, that's where you come in, pilot our (untested) roller droid around the facility and grab the packages!

Credits:
Music/Sound Effects: Tsujimoto

https://itch.io/profile/tsujimoto

Art: SomeFarang
